pages.text: A glossary of ball python-related terms:$(br2)$(li)Alien heads: The patches on the side of a ball python, so named for their shape that often resembles two eyes and a strange head.$(li)Blushing: Lighter patches found in the dark areas of some morphs such as pastel.$(li)Flames: Blushing originating from the belly and travelling up the sides of the python.
